reviewText:
I have this DVD and others from the series at home. I did not buy them on Amazon, but I shall post by two cents here.

The American Honor Society has done great work presenting the American People with these and other accounts of the records and actions of our men and women who made possible the history of our fighting to preserve peace and freedom throughout the world. To the South China Sea, fighting through Vietnam, it makes me proud to be the owner of this disk, and many more stories that the series contains.

I am proud to be an American.
